name: Adrenalin by Li_Bert_I
description:
You are pursued for some mess with government. Now you are in the forest, where police raid is already waiting for you, and a helicopter is chasing you. One rocket shot and you are DEAD! 

But wait, do these gunshots MOTIVATE you? MORE PAIN - MORE SPEED!

 

This game was created for WOWIE Game Jam 3

Main music theme:

Stasis Chamber by Apoxode (c) copyright 2021 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Apoxode/63087 Ft: BeatMachine, Martijn de Boer, spinningmerkaba
